description: The Frostdancer Pup is a young, nimble creature found in icy terrains. Its fur shimmers with frost, and it leaves a trail of ice crystals as it moves. Though still young, it possesses a natural grace and agility that makes it a formidable opponent. Its playful nature belies its ability to defend itself and its pack.

traits.name: Frost Aura
traits.description: The Frostdancer Pup emits an aura of cold in a 5-foot radius. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura takes 2 (1d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Frostbite Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Icy Dash
actions.description: The Frostdancer Pup can dash as a bonus action. When it does, it leaves behind a trail of slippery ice that remains until the start of its next turn. Any creature moving through the trail must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.
